name: Sulphide from the Shadow (Andrey Radostev)
description:
The game features Russian, English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, Italian and Chinese languages.

Warning !!!
*- The game contains jumpscare!!!, flashing lights and loud sounds !!!*

Description.
You take on the role of Constantine's ghost hunter. His cousin is going through hard times and suffering from constant fear. Every night in his house, terrible sounds are emitted from the basement, he needs to figure out what the matter is, so he entrusts this business to you! With your equipment, you go to his house at night and spend the night there. Find out the terrible secret lurking in this basement!
